name: tts-benchmarking-tool
description: TTS Benchmarking Tool for comparing OpenAI and Murf AI

scripts.dev: source .env && source venv/bin/activate && streamlit run app.py
scripts.start: source .env && source venv/bin/activate && streamlit run app.py --server.port=8501
scripts.install: python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && echo 'Setup complete! Now add your API keys to .env file'

author: TTS Benchmarking Tool
